pullRequest.title: Phase 1 of Fusion-SV migration
pullRequest.bodyText:
This pr includes

Pulling fusion from structural variant endpoint
Update study-view fusion api to fetch appropriate count for both fusion and structural variants

commit.message: Rename fusion to structual variant genes in study-view api

nodes.bodyText: For consistency with other service classes, can we move validation checks to service layer?
Any idea what to expect of the runtime performance of this query?
Nice.  Should we add a "TODO" comment here to remove once fusions are migrated to sv table in database?
